varieties.name: Pearl Drop
varieties.description: A rare white strawberry variety with a pearly sheen and delicate floral notes. Known for its exceptional sweetness and subtle vanilla undertones.

varieties.name: Aurora Gem
varieties.description: A unique bi-colored strawberry that transitions from rose pink to ruby red as it ripens. Prized for its complex flavor profile.

varieties.name: Twilight Blush
varieties.description: A deep purple-red variety with a natural silvery sheen on its leaves. Produces intensely aromatic berries with notes of wild berries.
